author: Frankula
name: Omega
description:
<style type="text/css"> p { margin-bottom: 0.1in; line-height: 120%; } </style>

This is a unique, experimental theme, and may not be practical for everyday use in a work environment as form takes precedence in the UI. Having said that; this theme breaks away from all the traditional Cinnamon paradigms with a, (and so far as I can discover, one-of-a-kind), round pop-up menu and a general tendency towards round and oval shapes. Comprehensive attention to detail has been implemented to make certain this theme is consistent across all stylings and to ensure its viability as a UI is not exceeded by its quirkiness.

Of possible interest to people wishing to modify this theme: It has had its Cinnamon file thoroughly indexed by section and commented-out lines for very quick access with a text editor alone. Included in the .css file are 16 extra applet stylings:

 

Windows Quick List applet

User Applet

Slingshot

Xcenter

Stopwatch

Desktop Capture applet

Color Picker applet

Sticky Notes desklet

Reddit reader

Calculator

G-tile

Weather applet

Snap/Tile OSD Popup

TimeAndDate desklet

SoundBox desklet (Mint theme)

Network Data Usage Monitor applet

 

Omega II Metacity; GTK 2/3; Cursors; Omega GDM splash screen; and wallpaper included. Feel free to comment, questions will be addressed ASAP.
